title: Иные
overview: Alternative 40s, Leningrad. Saving her brother, a fragile girl throws away a truck and a tram with the help of a supernatural force that she cannot control. They call themselves "Others" because they were born with a special gift. How to use force is up to everyone to decide for themselves. But the collision of two worlds is only a matter of time. The mysterious foreigner Neumann begins the hunt for an unusual girl from Leningrad, marking the beginning of the largest war in the history of mankind.
